chunks.zh: [福利] 抢先体验 Xactions - macOS 平台强大的自动化执行者！
chunks.en: [Benefit] Get a sneak peek at Xactions - a powerful automation executor on macOS!

chunks.zh: 大家好，很高兴向大家推荐一款全新的 macOS 应用 - Xactions ，它是一款强大的自动化执行者，专为提升工作效率而设计。
chunks.en: Hello everyone, I am very happy to recommend a brand new macOS application to everyone - Xactions, it is a powerful automation executor designed to improve work efficiency.

chunks.zh: 借助于 Xactions 的自动化实现，可以帮你从繁琐、重复的劳动中解放出来，让你专注于更重要的事情。
chunks.en: With the help of Xactions' automation implementation, it can help you free yourself from tedious and repetitive labor, allowing you to focus on more important things.

chunks.zh:
App Store 下载链接： https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/xactions/id6470151108

主要功能：
- 设置点击按键：你可以自定义点击按键/组合键，设置重复次数与间隔，轻松实现自动化操作。
chunks.en:
App Store download link: https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/xactions/id6470151108

Main features:
- Set click keys: You can customize click keys/combination keys, set the number of repetitions and intervals to easily achieve automated operations.

chunks.zh: - 截图识别：支持根据截图识别在屏幕上的坐标执行点击操作，让操作更精准。
chunks.en: - Screenshot recognition: Supports performing click operations on the coordinates on the screen based on screenshot recognition for more precise operation.

chunks.zh: - 自动输入文本：在指定位置自动输入文本内容，并执行复杂交互，提升工作效率。
chunks.en: - Automatically enter text: Automatically enter text content at the specified location and perform complex interactions to improve work efficiency.

chunks.zh: - 连续执行动作：设置连续执行动作，帮助你实现枯燥复杂的操作流程。
chunks.en: - Continuously execute actions: Set up continuous execution actions to help you achieve tedious and complex operating procedures.

chunks.zh: - Shell 脚本支持：支持运行 Shell 脚本，灵活应对各种需求。
chunks.en: - Shell script support: Support running Shell scripts to flexibly meet various needs.

chunks.zh: - 应用程序管理：轻松启动或切换应用程序，提升工作流的流畅性。
chunks.en: - Application management: Easily launch or switch applications to improve the smoothness of the workflow.

chunks.zh: - 实时日志输出：支持实时日志输出，便于追踪和调试。
chunks.en: - Real-time log output: Supports real-time log output for easy tracking and debugging.

chunks.zh: - 多种鼠标动作：支持单击、双击、长按等鼠标动作，满足多样化操作需求。
chunks.en: - Multiple mouse actions: Supports single-click, double-click, long-press and other mouse actions to meet diverse operation needs.

chunks.zh: - 更多功能：更多功能正在开发中，即将推出，敬请期待！
chunks.en: - More features: More features are under development and will be launched soon, so stay tuned!

chunks.zh:
欢迎通过上面的下载链接体验 Xactions app ，并通过邮件和我们反馈任何你遇到的问题： support@trolltechX.com

下面是 30 个兑换码：
chunks.en:
Welcome to experience the Xactions app through the download link above, and send us any problems you encounter via email: support@trolltechX.com

Here are 30 redemption codes:

chunks.zh: 如何在 Mac 上使用兑换码：- 在 Mac 上前往 App Store App 。
chunks.en: How to use the redemption code on Mac: - Go to the App Store App on your Mac.

chunks.zh: - 点按左下角你的姓名（或者如果尚未登录，请点按“登录”）。
chunks.en: - Click your name in the lower left corner (or click 'Log In' if you are not already logged in).

chunks.zh: - 点按右上角的“兑换充值卡”，然后输入下载代码或充值卡的代码。
chunks.en: - Click 'Redeem Gift Card' in the upper right corner, and then enter the download code or the gift card code.
